name: Banana Ice Cream v3
description:
I've been trying to clone King Kong by Majestic for a long time, and this revision is the closest I've gotten so far. Off the shake, it almost tastes identical to me, but I'll wait and see how it develops after a steep.

The description on the Majestic website States, "This decadent banana creme brulee is so good, youâ€™ll find yourself prepared to scale the walls of the nearest skyscraper for just one taste!"
author: MightyShill

reviews.text: This is truly a great recipe, I thoroughly enjoyed this recipe and have nearly vaped the whole thing already! Personally, I would like the banana flavour a tad stronger, and I hope to learn how to get an ice cold milk feel to a cream. Great use of LB VIC. You really can S+V this, but it really starts to shine at 4-5 days. Spot on @mightyshill! I may play with this in the future! It's very close to Banana Ice Cream by Sticky Fingers (AU) which I want to clone ðŸ¤“
Great recipe after a few days steep. If you like banana. you will be pleased with this one for sure. Nice body and vapes very well.
